meanings.sent1: The fuller worked diligently to full the cloth and make it soft.
meanings.sent2: The skilled fuller carefully worked on the fabric to achieve the desired texture.
meanings.sent3: The playful fuller accidentally turned the cloth into a fluffy cloud!
meanings.sent4: The experienced fuller weaved magic into the fabric, transforming it into a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated fuller's hands moved swiftly, creating a masterpiece out of the plain material.

meanings.definition: Having a large amount of something.
meanings.sent1: The basket was fuller than usual with ripe fruits.
meanings.sent2: Her smile grew fuller as she heard the good news.
meanings.sent3: The room felt fuller with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: His heart was fuller than ever with love and gratitude.
meanings.sent5: The sky seemed fuller of stars on that clear night, twinkling brightly above.

meanings.definition: To make something full or complete.
meanings.sent1: She used extra ingredients to fuller the soup and enhance its flavor.
meanings.sent2: The artist's final brush strokes fullered the painting, bringing it to life.
meanings.sent3: He tried to fuller the story with exaggerated details, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The music gradually fullered the room, filling every corner with its melody.
meanings.sent5: Her kindness and generosity never fail to fuller the hearts of those around her.
